text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/device-relationtype defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
gateway GatewayThe linked device acting as a communication/data collector, translator or controller for the current device (e.g., mobile phone application that relays a blood pressure device's data).
container containerThe linked device is a container for the current device.
replaces ReplacesThe current device replaces the linked device.
previous PreviousThe current device is a previous device and has been replaced by the linked device.
connected ConnectedThe linked device is connected to the current device.

name: DeviceRelationType
title: DeviceRelationType
description: The type of relation between devices.

concept.definition: The linked device acting as a communication/data collector, translator or controller for the current device (e.g., mobile phone application that relays a blood pressure device's data).
The linked device is a container for the current device.
The current device replaces the linked device.
The current device is a previous device and has been replaced by the linked device.
The linked device is connected to the current device.
